x-codeSamples.source:
import requests
import json

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/create/shipment"

payload = json.dumps({
  "oShipData": {
    "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",
    "Service Level": "PL",
    "Close Time": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Close Date": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
    "Shipper Name": "LLYN STRONG",
    "Shipper Address 1": "119 NORTH MAIN STREET",
    "Shipper Address 2": "417 Oakbend Blvd.",
    "Shipper City": "GREENVILLE",
    "Shipper State": "SC",
    "Shipper Zip": 29601,
    "Shipper Country": "US",
    "Shipper Phone": 8642335900,
    "Shipper Contact": "KATE",
    "Shipper Email": "ash@yahoo.com",
    "Consignee Name": "SOLIDSCAPE, INC.",
    "Consignee Address 1": "316 DANIEL WEBSTER HIGHWAY",
    "Consignee Address 2": "apt 345",
    "Consignee City": "MERRIMACK",
    "Consignee State": "NH",
    "Consignee Zip": 3054,
    "Consignee Country": "US",
    "Consignee Phone": "603 429-9700",
    "Consignee Contact": "Marilyn King",
    "Consignee Email": "mking@solidscape.com",
    "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
    "Shipment Line List": [
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
        "Weight": "5",
        "Height": "4.0",
        "Length": "2.0",
        "Width": "3.0",
        "Pieces": "4",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "in",
        "PieceType": "CYL",
        "Hazmat": "1"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTestTestTest Test Test TestTest",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      },
      {
        "Description": "TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",
        "Weight": "20",
        "Height": "5",
        "Length": "30",
        "Width": "10",
        "Pieces": "20",
        "WeightUOMV3": "lb",
        "DimUOMV3": "cm",
        "PieceType": "SKD",
        "Hazmat": "0"
      }
    ],
    "Reference List": [
      {
        "Reference No": "RMA 32768"
      }
    ],
    "New Shipment Accessorials List": [
      {
        "Code": "PALL"
      },
      {
        "Code": "SHRNK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "WEEK"
      },
      {
        "Code": "HOLPU"
      },
      {
        "Code": "LIMPU"
      }
    ]
  }
})
headers = {
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request POST 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/create/shipment' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "oShipData":{
        "Ready Date": "2021-05-31T06:47:00",
        "Service Level": "PL",
        "Close Time": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
        "Close Date": "2021-05-31T17:00:00",
        "Shipper Name": "LLYN STRONG",
        "Shipper Address 1": "119 NORTH MAIN STREET",
        "Shipper Address 2": "417 Oakbend Blvd.",
        "Shipper City": "GREENVILLE",
        "Shipper State": "SC",
        "Shipper Zip": 29601,
        "Shipper Country": "US",
        "Shipper Phone": 8642335900,
        "Shipper Contact": "KATE",
        "Shipper Email": "ash@yahoo.com",
        "Consignee Name": "SOLIDSCAPE, INC.",
        "Consignee Address 1": "316 DANIEL WEBSTER HIGHWAY",
        "Consignee Address 2": "apt 345",
        "Consignee City": "MERRIMACK",
        "Consignee State": "NH",
        "Consignee Zip": 3054,
        "Consignee Country": "US",
        "Consignee Phone": "603 429-9700",
        "Consignee Contact": "Marilyn King",
        "Consignee Email": "mking@solidscape.com",
        "Special Instructions": "INSIDE PICKUP LIFTGATE REQURIED",
      "Shipment Line List":[
         {
            "Description":"TestTestTestTest Test Test 12345678iubvsdbvojbvjbsovbsovosv",
            "Weight":"5",
            "Height":"4.0",
            "Length":"2.0",
            "Width":"3.0",
            "Pieces":"4",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"in",
            "PieceType":"CYL",
            "Hazmat":"1"
         },
         {
            "Description":"TestTestTestTest Test Test TestTest",
            "Weight":"20",
            "Height":"5",
            "Length":"30",
            "Width":"10",
            "Pieces":"20",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"cm",
            "PieceType":"SKD",
            "Hazmat":"0"
         },
         {
            "Description":"TestTest 4578 TestTestboubsovbosvbobdjobvoavbovebv",
            "Weight":"20",
            "Height":"5",
            "Length":"30",
            "Width":"10",
            "Pieces":"20",
            "WeightUOMV3":"lb",
            "DimUOMV3":"cm",
            "PieceType":"SKD",
            "Hazmat":"0"
         }
      ],
      "Reference List":[
         {
            "Reference No":"RMA 32768"
         }
      ],
      "New Shipment Accessorials List":[
         {
            "Code":"PALL"
         },
         {
            "Code":"SHRNK"
         },
         {
            "Code":"WEEK"
         },
         {
            "Code":"HOLPU"
         },
         {
            "Code":"LIMPU"
         }
      ]
   }
}'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/detail?milestone_history=1&file_nbr=3442857&house_bill_nbr=5869787' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/shipment/info?file_nbr=3441839&house_bill_nbr=5865331' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/invoice/detail?house_bill_nbr=5865228' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

import requests

url = "https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232"

payload="<file contents here>"
headers = {
  'x-api-key': '<X-API-KEY>',
  'Content-Type': 'text/plain'
}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data=payload)

print(response.text)

curl --location --request GET 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1/billoflading?house_bill_nbr=5865232' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>' \
--header 'Content-Type: text/plain' \
--data-binary '@'

curl --location 'https://dev-api.omnilogistics.com/v1.0/wms/orderstatus?DateFrom=2023-02-16T09%3A00%3A00&DateTo=2023-02-16T19%3A00%3A01' \
--header 'x-api-key: <X-API-KEY>'

ApiKeyAuth.description: For this sample, you can use the api key `x-api-key` to test the authorization filters.
ApiKeyAuth.name: x-api-key
